alert.note: Alert for Western Passaic (New Jersey) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 25 at 6:53AM EST until February 25 at 1:00PM EST by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 PM EST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation. Total combined snow and sleet accumulations of 1 to 3 inches. Ice accumulations of up to a tenth of an inch across Orange and Putnam Counties, and a tenth to two tenths of an inch across Westchester, Rockland, and Western Passaic Counties. * WHERE...In New Jersey, Western Passaic County. In New York, Orange, Rockland, Putnam and Northern Westchester Counties. * WHEN...Until 1 PM EST this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Check local Department of Transportation information services for the latest road conditions.
